name: Car Loan 4U
tag_list: car-credit, car-loans, car-loan, car-finance, uk, used, new, ford, bmw, nissan, vauxhall
overview:
Car Loan 4U is the leading provider of car finance in the UK.

With an extensive panel of lenders, we facilitate the process of matching our customers requirements with the the appropriate lender.

We even have solutions for individuals who have a bad credit history or who are looking for 0% finance. We guarantee the ultimate customer service for anyone who is looking to purchase a new or used vehicle.

Our headquarters are based just outside of Manchester, in Macclesfield and we have been growing our business substantially for over 5 years.

In 2012 we plan on launching a competition to win the car of your dreams, within a specific budget, so please visit our website, twitter or facebook page to keep yourself updated.
